Title: Delta Govt distributes relief to flood victims
Summary: The Delta Government distributed relief materials to victims of the 2024 flood disaster in various parts of the state . At a ceremony in Asaba, Co-chairman of the State Flood Management Committee, Mr Terry Etacherure, presented the materials .

Title: Police arrest three suspected kidnappers, motorcycle thieves in Taraba
Summary: Police arrest three suspected members of notorious kidnapping and motorcycle theft gang in Taraba . Police spokesperson, James Leshen, in a statement, said the gang was operating in the Takum Local Government Council of the state .

Title: FG orders emergency repairs on Lagos-Ibadan expressway bridges
Summary: Federal Government has raised concerns over state of infrastructure along the Lagos-Ibadan Expressway . Minister of Works, David Umahi, disclosed this during a joint inspection tour with directors of highways, highways, and other agencies .

Title: FG launches national livestock programme in Plateau
Summary: Federal Ministry of Livestock Development launches national livestock programme in Plateau . Mr Idi Maiha launched the programme during a visit to the Grazing Reserve in Wase Local Government Area .

Title: Drug case: FBI, DEA request more time to produce Tinubu’s records
Summary: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) and the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) are seeking a three-month extension from the United States District Court for the District of Columbia to release documents relating to President Bola Tinubu’s records .

Title: Premier League win one of ‘best days of my life’, says Liverpool boss Slot
Summary: Liverpool boss says Premier League win one of ‘best days of my life’, says Slot . "Maybe for all the Liverpool fans, but for many of them, one of the best days of their lives, and I think it was the same for me," he says .

Title: Canelo Álvarez Joins 1win as a New Brand Ambassador Amid His Pursuit to Reclaim Super Middleweight Supremacy
Summary: 1win, a global iGaming brand, has announced a new partnership with boxing superstar Canelo Álvarez . The news comes as �álvarez gets ready to face undefeated contender William Scull in a bout for the IBF super middleweight title .

Title: After four years locked indoors, rescued children see sunlight for first time
Summary: After four years locked indoors, rescued children see sunlight for first time in their memory . Three young children imprisoned inside a filthy home in Oviedo for nearly four years were finally freed this week .

Title: FG approves dual certification in colleges of education
Summary: FG approves dual certification in colleges of education . Institutions are undergoing major curriculum restructuring, staff development, and administrative realignment . To meet the demands of this new structure, institutions are undergoing curriculum restructuring .

Title: Seyi Tinubu denies ‘bribing, abducting, torturing’ NANS president
Summary: Tinubu rejected the offer, saying he could not promote a president who had not delivered results . He claimed that, upon refusal, plans were made to abduct him .

Title: Israeli strikes kill 20 in Gaza
Summary: Civil defence official Mohammed al-Mughayyir told AFP 20 people had been killed since dawn on Friday, including nine following the Israeli bombardment of a home in Bureij camp in central Gaza . The Red Cross warned that the humanitarian response in Gaza was on the “verge of total collapse” Israel resumed its military

Title: Plant trees for birthdays, anniversaries, not parties, NCF urges Nigerians
Summary: Director-General of Nigeria Conservative Foundation, Mr Joseph Onoja, has called on Nigerians to organise tree planting events to celebrate birthdays and anniversaries rather than throw lavish parties . He said that being intentional about tree planting by channelling resources to it would go a long way to reducing the effects of climate change in the

Title: Fire razes three shops, others in Oyo
Summary: No fewer than three shops were razed by fire in the early hours of Friday in Sango, Ibadan, the Oyo State capital . The fire reportedly began after an electrical spark from a plugged-in freezer ignited nearby combustible materials . Though no casualties were recorded, goods including freezers, drinks, and other valu

Title: Cardinals set to elect new Pope May 7
Summary: A record 133 cardinals will gather below Michelangelo’s famed frescoes in the Sistine Chapel to vote in secret for a new pontiff . The conclave will signal to the world the outcome by burning ballots in a special stove, with the chimney emitting black smoke if no one has been elected, or white smoke

Title: Police recover N10m stolen salt in Bauchi
Summary: The Bauchi State Police Command has disclosed the successful interception of a truck transporting refined iodised salt, which was suspected of being diverted . The operation equally resulted in the apprehension of two individuals . The total estimated value of the confiscated salt amounts to approximately ten million two hundred thousand Naira (₦10,200,000
